name: Hot Chocolate (Loaf Pizza Studios)
description:
Made for the Winter Melon Game Jam 2022. Caused us a lot of of headache to bring this together considering the relaxing nature of the game, but should be a calm, enjoyable experience. There's no real 'lose' condition, making this more of an experience rather than a game. 

Controls are about as basic as they can get: 

WASD - Move 

Mouse - Look 

Click - Interact 

That's about it, thanks for reading.

Made by JonnyBonBon & redback128
